Concerta<tm tmtype="reg"/> XL Indications and dose

Attention deficit hyperactivity disorder

By mouth

  • Adult

    Initially 18 mg once daily, dose to be taken in the morning; adjusted at weekly intervals according to response; maximum 108 mg per day.

Dose equivalence and conversion

Total daily dose of 15 mg of standard-release formulation is considered equivalent to Concerta XL 18 mg once daily.

 Cautions

Dysphagia (dose form not appropriate); restricted gastro-intestinal lumen (dose form not appropriate)

Prescribing and dispensing information

Consists of an immediate-release component (22% of the dose) and a modified-release component (78% of the dose).
Patient and carer advice

Tablet membrane may pass through gastro-intestinal tract unchanged.
Clinical medicinal product information Clinical medicinal product information
